account.title: Login
account.same_password: The entered password is identical to the old password
account.id_usr: The ID of the user within his role
account.user_update_message: User data has been changed correctly. Please log in again using your new login or password.

errors.expiration_date_invalid_format: Incorrect date format entered. The date should be in the format dd.MM.yyyy (e.g. 02.11.2023)

name.capital_letter: The name must start with a capital letter
name.2-90: The name must contain between 2 and 90 characters
name.2-70: The name must contain between 2 and 70 characters
name.only_numbers: The name cannot contain numbers only

medicines.parallel_importer_2-100: The parallel importer can be empty or contain between 2 and 100 characters
medicines.parallel_importer_capital_letter: The parallel importer must start with a capital letter
medicines.expiration_date_not_after_then_today: The expiration date cannot be earlier than the current one

producer.country_2-90: The country must be between 2 and 90 characters
producer.country_invalid: Country must start with a capital letter and cannot contain numbers or other characters (e.g. Poland, UK)

whole_med.<1: The value cannot be lower than 1
whole_med.>9999: The value cannot be higher than 9999
whole_med.date_of_purchase: Purchase date cannot be later than the current date

password.length: The password must be between 8 and 20 characters long
